author: justinpma
post_text: May 6, 2016 at 9:43 AM#1Hi,How can I write a macro for storing cue with dmx source:dmx in and all for selected?

posts.author: justinpma
posts.post_text: May 6, 2016 at 9:43 AM#1Hi,How can I write a macro for storing cue with dmx source:dmx in and all for selected?

posts.author: justinpma
posts.post_text: May 7, 2016 at 3:48 AM#3How can I do that in one command?The dmx in command didn't work too

posts.author: Duplicate Ryan Kanarek
posts.post_text: May 7, 2016 at 4:19 AM#4Just combine the /options into one line: Store /use= /so=Make sure you enclose "DMX In" in quotes, otherwise it'll think you're trying to say /so=dmx.

posts.author: justinpma
posts.post_text: May 7, 2016 at 4:35 AM#5Got it, thank you

posts.author: Brock
posts.post_text: August 4, 2016 at 11:58 AM#6I made this one, that steals the incoming position data for selected fixtures, and stores it on the first available position preset...Have funBrockFilesPosition theif.xml758 Byte – 554 Downloads

title: Macro for dmx in and all for selected
